showScoreExcerpt:
I Need That is a vehicle...built to highlight the kind of profane, lovable, everyman curmudgeon DeVito has specialized in since he played Louie De Palma on TV’s “Taxi.” Its structure is essentially that of a situation, with material suitable for an hour-long one-act unconvincingly stretched to fill an extra 40 minutes or so. Just as the set is crammed with personal “stuff,” so is I Need That with dramaturgic stuff.
